title: Blessed Solanus Casey Novena
description: Blessed Solanus Casey was an American Capuchin Franciscan priest who demonstrated great humility and love for others in spite of many setbacks and obstacles he faced throughout his life. Pray this novena for overcoming setbacks and apparent failures.

days.prayer:

@media (max-width: 768px) { #branch-daily-prayer-9 .notice--info { padding: 16px 14px !important; } #branch-daily-prayer-9 a > div:last-child { padding: 16px 20px !important; font-size: 1.1em !important; } }

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

O God, I adore You. I give myself to You. May I be the person You want me to be, and May Your will be done in my life today. I thank You for the gifts You gave Father Solanus. If it is Your Will, bless us with the Canonization of Father Solanus so that others may imitate and carry on his love for all the poor and suffering of our world. As he joyfully accepted Your divine plans, I ask You, according to Your Will, to hear my prayer for (mention request here‚Ä¶) through Jesus Christ our Lord. Amen. Blessed be God in all His Designs.

Our Father Hail Mary Glory Be

In the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

Answered Prayers From This Novena

Today is day 9 for my novena fir a twice removed relative who has a rare form of bile duct cancer. He jyst retired from his Chartered Accountant business. He is not Catholic but his wife is but not practicing. The whole family (2 adult children also) have been traumatized by this illness.

A couple of years ago I received a miracle from Blessed Dolanus. Made a casual request but from the heart, to rescue my long-forgotten relatives from Purgatory as I knew we have had grave generational sin. Immediately, I saw in my mind‚Äôs eye, about 8 blacked men and women escaping Purgatory, their arms raised in praising God for being released from Purgatory. I was so overcome with emotion. To this day, I ‚Äúsee‚Äù this like it just happened, giving thanks to God for His Mercy through the intercession of Blessed Solanus.

So, I am praying for God‚Äôs most perfect Will to be done in the cancer situation for Mike and his family. I am hopeful.

from L.B.

My daughter in law had a tough labor and delivery with our granddaughter on July 25. Thank God ahead of time mother and one week later mom and baby are healthy.

from J.H.

Dear Blessed Solanus Casey Novena,

I want to express my gratitude for answering my prayers. Although my husband and I are still separated and haven‚Äôt fully reconciled, we‚Äôve begun communicating and have decided to seek virtual counseling.

I‚Äôm sincerely thankful, but I ask for continued prayers.

from H.O.
